ISSUE.TITLE: Synologoy NAS : the 0.90.10 docker container crash
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello the 0.90.10 docker container crash docker run nocodb/nocodb Digest: sha256:5cee7583b5bbe93d79b4ee83d73160480daa697521f2c94bf06a14d45f3e6187 Status: Downloaded newer image for nocodb/nocodb:latest Knex: run $ npm install sqlite3 --save Error relocating /usr/src/app/node_modules/sqlite3/lib/binding/napi-v6-linux-x64/node_sqlite3.node: fcntl64: symbol not found Error: Error relocating /usr/src/app/node_modules/sqlite3/lib/binding/napi-v6-linux-x64/node_sqlite3.node: fcntl64: symbol not found at Object.Module._extensions..node (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1057:18) at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:863:32) at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:708:14) at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:887:19) at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:74:18) at Object.<anonymous> (/usr/src/app/node_modules/sqlite3/lib/sqlite3-binding.js:4:15) at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:999:30) at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1027:10) at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:863:32) at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:708:14) App started successfully. Visit -> http://localhost:8080undefined Regards

COMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: downgrade sqlite version re #1970 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
